html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10562024-09-20IC
ActStatistics Act
PrecisReappointment of ANDRÉ LORANGER of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chief Statistician of Canada, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure, for a term of six months or until such time as a new Chief Statistician is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 1, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of ANDRÉ LORANGER of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chief Statistician of Canada, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure, for a term of six months or until such time as a new Chief Statistician is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 1, 2024.
